document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">There </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">hour </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">begging </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">stops, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">interceding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">lips </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Perceive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">prayer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">vain. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">shalt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">kinder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">sword </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">disappointing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">God </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">"Disciple, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">call </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">again." </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: There comes an hour when begging stops
